data.title: owner attitude
data.text: the pizza is superb   but the owner or people running it    dislike woman  and I mean all woman   and you are made to feel like you don't belong.    MEN  are fine      I wont ever go back

data.title: Best bang for the Buck!!
data.text: We eat here all the time. Delicious, hot and value per dollar kills Little Caesars any day of the week! We always order squares so I can't comment on the round. The only small complaint I have....this place can get pretty busy at dinner time and as such, it can be a longer wait for your order (at least for pickup) don't be in a big hurry to get there after placing your order, 30 minutes seems to be the norm lately. I can't complain too loudly because a busy restaurant is a good thing...it typically means it's GOOD!! My last comment is a product suggestion for management: the only item I've had from your establishment that was just kind of eh, was the breadsticks. Maybe change them up a little? Kind of like Hungry Howies or Dominos? Just a thought.

data.title: Best Pizza in Warren
data.text: Almost missed the bus with this place lived in the neighborhood 15 years and just had there Pizza for the last year and Oh my, glad I tried it . Awesome 3 cheese bread and deluxe meat pizza. Pepperoni is just spicy enough . make sure you add butter and parmesan cheese shake to the crust and there will be nothing to throwaway. Is awesome taste wise and easy on the wallet. 2 large Deluxe round Pizza's (with butter parm shake) large cheese bread and a 1 liter soda for about 25 bucks . Give it a try wont be disappointed ...

data.title: great neighborhood spot to order a pizza
data.text:
we just had a big party & ordered 25 pizzas from here--perfect service--erio, the
owner said he would have them by 3:30pm saturday & he did--they were all hot &
yummy--had the same order 5 years ago & again it was perfect--the prices are
reasonable--they have a couple tables that you can eat in the restaurant, but I
think it's mainly carry out--he says everything is fresh--it's open every day until
10pm--friday & saturday until 11pm--
